sentences.en: Aspirin apparently thins the blood and inhibits clotting.
sentences.cn: 阿司匹林能显著地稀释血液、抑制血液凝结。

sentences.en: Aspirin can ulcerate the stomach lining.
sentences.cn: 阿司匹林能造成胃壁溃.
阿司匹林是药性平和的止痛药。

sentences.en: Aspirin is a wonderful cure for colds.
sentences.cn: 阿斯匹林是治感冒的妙药.

sentences.en: Aspirin thins the blood, letting it flow more easily through narrowed blood vessels.
sentences.cn: 阿司匹林可以稀释血液，使其在变窄的血管里更顺畅地流动。
阿斯匹林将止住你的头疼.
医生用阿司匹林为她治疗。

sentences.en: He took two aspirin immediately and washed them down with three cups of water.
sentences.cn: 他立刻吃了两片阿司匹林，用3杯水送服下去。

sentences.en: He would take two aspirin and sprawl out on his bed.
sentences.cn: 他会吃两片阿司匹林，然后摊开手脚躺在床上。

sentences.en: I bandaged the leg up and gave her aspirin for the pain.
sentences.cn: 我把她的腿用绷带包扎起来，并给了她阿司匹林止痛。

sentences.en: I don't take any drugs whatsoever, except aspirin for colds.
sentences.cn: 我什么药都不吃，除了感冒时吃阿司匹林。

sentences.en: Our doctor diagnosed a throat infection and prescribed antibiotic and junior aspirin.
sentences.cn: 我们的医生诊断是喉部感染，并且开了一些抗生素和小剂量阿司匹林。

sentences.en: She dosed him with non-aspirin tablets to reduce the fever.
sentences.cn: 她让他服用非阿司匹林药片降温退烧。

sentences.en: The aspirin seems to quiet the headache.
sentences.cn: 阿司匹林似乎使头痛减轻了.

sentences.en: The hospitals charge the patients for every aspirin.
sentences.cn: 医院每一片阿司匹林都要病人掏钱。

sentences.en: The nurse dosed out aspirin to a patient.
sentences.cn: 护士给病人服阿司匹林。
